channel.title: Requesting Titlescreen!
channel.description:
------------------------------------------------ Fire Pk V3, Starting up... ------------------------------------------------ Auto-Detected 32-bit (x86) System ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w . ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Exception in thread "Thread-1" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 at sign.signlink.byteArrayToInt(signlink.java:24) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:69) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-2" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 at sign.signlink.byteArrayToInt(signlink.java:24) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:69) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 at sign.signlink.byteArrayToInt(signlink.java:24) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:69) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Variable s: title screen
This is what i get when i'm trying to run the Fire-PK Client... I've tried cache redownloading/client deleting/java reinstalling... all that shit... so it just gets stuck to "Requesting Titlescreen" while loading the client...
Please HELP Thanks!

item.title: Requesting Titlescreen!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

SuomiPiru:

they are class files, is it possible to do something about it then?

Your going to get NOWHERE with only class files if you don’t know how to decompile them lmao.

Read full topic

SuomiPiru:

they are class files, is it possible to do something about it then?

You can just de-compile classes.

item.title: Requesting Titlescreen!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:


you have an array that is out of bounds...meaning the data it relates are not the same. You need to post the signlink lines specifically so we can see what array it is referring to help you further.

you have an array that is out of bounds…meaning the data it relates are not the same. You need to post the signlink lines specifically so we can see what array it is referring to help you further.
